question: How to get in contact with Shoppers?
answer: To get in contact with us, you can reach us via email or on our Facebook or Instagram account.

question: I'm intersted in collaborating. Whom do I contact?
answer: We love hearing this! Send your request to collaboration@shoppers.com, and give us information about your channel/platform, your followers and why you are a good fit with Shoppers.

question: Where do you ship?
answer: Currently, we ship all around the world.

question: What are you shipping option?
answer: We offer three ways to get your order quickly: Standard shipping to Europe and territories is free. Most orders are delivered within 3-5 business days. For even faster service, two-day expedited shipping is available for â‚¬15. Orders placed after 12:00 pm ET will ship the following business day.

question: I haven't received my order yet, what do i do?
answer: Please check your mailbox, including your spam folder, for an email from hello@Shoopers.com. The email will have your order tracking information.

question: What is the return policy?
answer: All Shoppers products carry a 180-day 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. If the product that you purchased isn't a good fit for you, for any reason, please send us proof of purchase to hello@Shoppers.com. We will happily issue you a refund.

question: Why should I create a customer account?
answer: We encourage you to create a customer account. An account will allow you to keep a record of all your purchases, billing and order tracking information. You can also store multiple shipping addresses to expedite the check-out process.

question: Where are Shoppers's product made?
answer: All of our products are made in Europe.

question: Still have questions?
answer: If you have additional questions, please contact us at hello@Shoppers.com
